item.title: Support Small World on Kickstarter (Especially for Table Top Day!)
item.description: [http://www.youtube.com/embed/x3m0PIWqkfQ] This Saturday, March 30th, is Table Top Day! Geek & Sundry has organized an international day to support, enjoy and play table top games. About a year ago a friend invited a friend of ours, my eldest son and myself over to have a table top gaming night. I was blown away by number of games now available. Youâ€™ve probably heard of some of the biggest, such as Settlers of Catan, but there is a revolution going on in old school games.
